title: RaaShya and Nana Learning life skills with scripture memory verses: Volume 1
description: RaaShya is an 11 year old girl that loves to go and visit her Grandmother who she calls Nana. RaaShya knows when she goes to visit her Nana she will get to help with things, and learn things from her Nana. She feels very loved from her Grandparents and has her own room when she goes to visit. Itâ€™s like a vacation. Nana tells her things about life and how to treat people. Nana has told RaaShya all things are possible with God. She can be and do what ever she puts her mind to. Come enjoy learning life skills with RaaShya and her Nana.
author: Vanessa Talbert
